name: Backstreets of the Mind
description: Sometimes we think that if we could change something from our past, our whole life would turn out differently.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 3 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2400 MB available space
